title: The Necessary Wife
overview: ‎Tawan loves freedom and does not want to depend on the whims of the boss, so he works for hire in several jobs. Once, cleaning the house of one of the clients, Thon accidentally takes her for the daughter of the mistress of the house. It would seem, what is the big deal? That's just he took her for his bride, the wedding with which agreed as a child his parents. ‎Thinking that her fiance - an unsaved churban and a villager, Yatfa (real bride) categorically refuses to marry the main character and instead of her marry Tawan.‎How will this tangle of misunderstanding unravel? What happens when Thon, already deeply in love with Tawan, learns about the deception? Will he be able to forgive her or avenge his broken heart?‎Remake of the eponymous lacorne 2001‎.
